content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 cup semisweet chocolate chips" )
( ing-1 "1/2 cup butter, softened" )
( ing-2 "1/2 cup white sugar" )
( ing-3 "1/2 cup packed brown sugar" )
( ing-4 "2 eggs" )
( ing-5 "1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract" )
( ing-6 "2 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-7 "1/2 teaspoon baking powder" )
( ing-8 "1/2 teaspoon baking soda" )

content.text: 0) Melt the chocolate chips in a heavy saucepan over very low heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the chocolate chips"@8:27 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a heavy saucepan"@31:47 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "very low heat"@53:66 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cream together the butter and sugars until light.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cream"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the butter"@18:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "sugars"@33:39 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
		)
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until light"@40:51 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Beat in the eggs, one at a time.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Beat in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the eggs"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "one at a time"@21:34 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir in the melted chocolate and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "the melted chocolate"@11:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "vanilla"@36:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) In a bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder and baking soda.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "whisk"@14:19 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the flour"@29:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "baking powder"@40:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "baking soda"@58:69 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Add to the butter mixture slowly.
8) Shape into 1-inch balls and place on a greased cookie sheet.
9) Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 12 to 14 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:heat ( temp-9-0 "350 degrees F"@12:25 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-9-1 "180 degrees C"@27:40 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "12 to 14 minutes"@46:62 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Let sit on cookie sheet for a minute or two before removing to a rack to cool.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "sit"@8:11 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-10-0 "cookie sheet"@15:27 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-10-0 "a minute or two"@32:47 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-10-0 "before removing to a rack to cool"@48:81 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
